overview: Join the Veggies in this two episode collection that teaches your kids the value in being faithful! Included in this special release are The Grapes of Wrath and Gideon: Tuba Warrior.  The Grapes of Wrath: What do you get when a bunch of very cranky grapes make fun of an unsuspecting Junior Asparagus? A lesson in what it truly means to forgive.  Gideon Tuba Warrior: Accompanied by a mere six carrots and six peas, will Gideon be able to stand against an army of thousands? Discover a tale of faithfulness and trust in this wall-shaking adventure.
title: VeggieTales: Growing Faithful Kids!
